attributes.action: DO NOT MAKE VACCINATIONS MANDATORY UNTIL FULLY LICENSED TO DO SO
attributes.additional_details: We ALL have the freedom of CHOICE. Whilst the vaccinations are UNLICENSED we should NOT be FORCED to have MEDICAL PROCEDURES AGAINST OUR WILL TO KEEP OUR JOBS.
attributes.background: To reconsider making these vaccinations mandatory while they are NOT licensed!

rejection.details:
It is already against the law for people to be required to undergo medical treatment, including vaccinations. The Coronavirus Act 2020 has not changed this.

We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Do not rollout Covid-19 vaccine passports: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/569957

Do not require health and social care workers to take covid-19 vaccination: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/577842

Outlaw discrimination against those who do not get a Covid-19 vaccination: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/575801

Prohibit employers from requiring employees to have a Covid-19 vaccine: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/575607
